hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Building modern web applications with **Next.js**, **NestJS**, **TypeScript**, **Prisma**, **MySQL**, and **Supabase**. Creating scalable solutions from frontend to backend.

statistics.title: By The Numbers
statistics.description: A glimpse into my journey and achievements

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a passionate **Full Stack Developer** with a love for creating innovative web solutions. My journey in software development has been driven by curiosity and a commitment to building applications that make a difference.
about.description2: I specialize in modern web technologies, focusing on creating scalable, maintainable, and user-friendly applications. From **frontend interfaces** to **backend APIs**, I bring ideas to life with clean code and best practices.

code.title: Clean Code
code.description: Writing maintainable and scalable code following best practices

rocket.title: Fast Delivery
rocket.description: Efficient development process with quick turnaround times

heart.description: Genuine love for technology and continuous learning

target.description: Focused on delivering solutions that meet business objectives

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Creating beautiful and interactive user interfaces with React, Next.js, and TypeScript

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Developing robust APIs and server-side solutions with NestJS and Node.js

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.description: Deploying and managing applications on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Supabase

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Building cross-platform mobile applications with React Native and Flutter

devops.title: DevOps & CI/CD
devops.description: Setting up automated deployment pipelines and infrastructure management
devops.moreContent: I help teams streamline their development workflow with modern DevOps practices:
features: Container orchestration with Docker and Kubernetes
Infrastructure as Code with Terraform and CloudFormation
